projects.title: DTETI Open House
projects.desc: Website built for DTETI UGM Open House 2022, made by the IT Team using NextJS, Tailwindcss, and Firebase.

projects.title: Money Manager
projects.desc: Website to help manage spendings and gains. Made using NextJS and Firestore DB. This is a collaboration work with my high school friend Glorious Satria.

projects.title: Anime Ingfo
projects.desc: Website to view anime details and updates. Made using Typescript, NextJS, and Tailwindcss.

projects.title: Hamagon
projects.desc: Group project made for DTETI Summer School Hackathon. An AI based web app to check plant's health. Front end made using NextJS and Tailwindcss, back end made using Python Flask.

projects.title: Weather Website
projects.desc: Website to view the weather of the user's location. Made using ReactJS, TailwindCSS, and Axios. Data provided by BMKG Indonesia, public API by ibnux (github)

projects.title: Online Shop Web
projects.desc: A simple online shopping website made using ReactJS, SCSS, and Firebase for database.

projects.title: To Do List Web
projects.desc: Simple task list web made using ReactJS and Bootstrap. This web uses local storage.
